Summary: Star Like Object Slow Zig-Zag, Then Disappear
divs: Sighting DetailsI was out side and saw a bright yellow star in the sky, not blinking or glimmering, with a hint of red, then it slowly dimmed and went away. I looked again and it came back slowly, but not as bright... It seemed to zigzag slowly north east, then dimmed again. I hope my mind is not playing tricks on me.
